line.en: 'OK everyone, don't do anything silly during the\nsummer vacation. Keep yourselves in good shape\nand try to avoid any injuries.'
'The term's over!'
'It's summer vacation!'
After having a school assembly in the morning we\nreturned to our classroom to take homeroom. With\nthat finished the first term is over!
It's the start of summer vacation!
Finally it's time for my second summer.
And with luck soon our dream will come true.
...But.
'Alright I'm going to head out.'
'Good luck...'
I told Kotori that I'm heading out to do glider\ntraining.
Actually, I was meant to make up for the training\nthat I didn't do during exams by doing intense\ntraining afterwards.
Still, it seems that Kotori has sensed something\nis up.
She looks back and forth between me and Ageha.
I haven't spoken to Ageha... Not at all starting\nfrom this morning.
Both Ageha and I haven't said a word to each\nother.
Ageha, having so many friends, chats normally to\neveryone else as if nothing has happened.
For my part, I try to act normal but... I wonder\nif I was successful.
I've been uncontrollably irritated since that\nphone call.
What is she hiding?
Too irritated to even consider asking her about\nit again.
That's why I...
'Ah you're here.'
A small figure approaches frantically pedaling a\ncute little bike.
'Sorry I'm late.'
'...Did you wait long?'
'Not at all. You have a long way to travel, so\nit's fine.'
'Getting ready takes a long time for you as\nwell.'
'It does and... you know...'
'...What? The thing under your clothes?'
Hotaru turns red.
She's cute.
'Don't tell me. You bought a new one?'
'You didn't, right?'
'I did!'
'There was no need to go that far.'
'I know but...'
'My size changed so I needed to buy new ones\nanyway.'
'Ah, you've grown have you?'
'Aoi, stop being dirty.'
'My bad.'
I honestly feel a little bad.
'Alright, shall we?'
Her face is so red it looks like she's suffering\nheat stroke.
'Let's get there quick so we can cool down.'
'O, OK!'
The place we go to is the secret point.
This was on Hotaru's request.
'I heard from Ageha that everyone used to play\naround here. So I wanted to see it for myself.'
That's right, Hotaru wasn't around at those\ntimes, was she?
'I was just thinking that it would be nice to go\nfor a swim, so it's perfect.'
For the time being we put down our things and get\nready to swim.
I wore my bathing suit underneath my clothes so\nall I have to do is take off my shirt and pants.
I start doing stretches by myself.
From what Hotaru said before she also wore her\nbathing suit underneath her clothes... So she\nshould ready momentarily.
Of course I only see this out of the corner of my\neye, I don't do anything sleazy.
I make sure not to look and patiently wait. And\nthen...
'I...I'm ready... OK.'
Shyly, making her thin body seem even more thin\nand small, Hotaru walks up to the water edge.
Hotaru doesn't have that kind of personality so\nshe doesn't scream out when she gets in the\nwater.
But still, while she lightly splashes her feet in\nthe water she gives me a bright smile that I've\nrarely seen.
'Alright, do it!'
Of course we do what must be done.
The patented Soaring Club leap from the rock\nface.
'Ah, yah, yah'
'Ok, don't cling.'
Holding her in my arms I fling her into the water\nwith all my strength... 1, 2, 3!
'Geaaahhh!'
'Yeah!'
I make a tough guy pose then jump in after her.
'Pffff!'
After swimming around for about an hour Hotaru\ngets out of the water and takes a break to\nstretch her arms and legs.
Another sight I rarely see from her, a smile that\nshows total liberation.
'Tired?'
'A little.'
'I'm still a little nervous.'
'It's good that you stayed curled up when you\njumped. If you let your arms and legs flail all\nover you might have belly flopped.'
'It's pretty scary.'
'The fact that you overcame that means you're one\nof us now.'
'Compared to stalling in a glider. Jumping from a\nrock is nothing.'
'So you're definitely going to fly?'
'Definitely. I'm going to fly in that sky.'
When I look up, there is nothing but the sky in\nmy sight.
Into this sky, with the wings that we have\ncreated, I'm going to fly.
We, the Soaring Club, and everyone who helped us\nout.
Everyone...
'Hey... Hotaru'
It's probably alright if I was to ask about that\nthing now.
'...Aoi, you're eyes have been looking pretty\nsuspect.'
'Huh?'
She says something completely unexpected so I\nslightly lose composure.
'But, I'm not really your type am I?...'
'What? No, it's not like...'
'I get it, you're more into girls like Ageha,\nright? Girls who have big eyes.'
'That's not how I judge girls!'
'So you like girls with small eyes?'
'Can you stop talking about big and small eyes?!'
'Not too big, not too small, nice shape, good\ncolor. You're too picky about eyes Aoi.'
'Don't talk like I'm some sort of eye\nconnoisseur!'
'Eye connoisseur...'
Hotaru looks at her reflection in the water.
'I've decent eyes don't I?'
'Yeah... I guess.'
I feel a bit uncomfortable staring straight at\nthem so I slightly avert my gaze.
But I can still see them quite clearly in the\ncorner of my eye.
...I thought it when I first saw her in her\nswimsuit, but they are prettier than I had\nimagined...
'You're not looking.'
'If I look you'll call me a pervert, right?'
'I won't so look properly.'
'You shouldn't say such risky things. I guy might\nget the wrong idea.'
'I don't mind if you get the wrong idea.'
'Again with that sort of thing.'
'I'm serious.'
Hotaru's eyes glisten, her eye lids drop\nslightly.
In so doing she seems to become a different\nperson. Enchanting.
She has the same appeal that Ageha had when we\nkissed.
'The other day Ageha said that stuff to me. You\ndid too.'
'But it's different now...'
'No one's around... It's just the two of us...'
'We can do whatever we want... I don't mind...'
'I don't mind what we do, that's why I came.'
'Hey... that's...'
My heart races strangely.
Wet skin, wet hair.
She's totally grown into a woman with fine\nfeatures.
Before I picked her up like it was nothing... but\neven now I still clearly recall the feel of her\nfirm, soft skin.
Her bathing suit clings to her wet skin, her\nmodest, yet shapely body, her exposed legs...
And her lips.
They're the same shape as Ageha's, waiting for\nme, lustrous...
Hotaru closes her eyes completely.
'You can't pat me on the head.'
Having been beaten to the punch my hand freezes\nin mid air.
'Don't treat me like a kid. Do it properly.'
To be honest Hotaru is also really cute.
Putting all flattery aside she really has turned\ninto a beautiful girl.
Her body has developed completely into a woman\nand she's pretty.
And unlike Ageha she's not impossible to read and\nshe doesn't drive me nuts...
My heart races in that same strange way as it did\nwith Ageha.
And just like that my nether region started to\nreact on its own.
No, no this is Hotaru, it's not Ageha.
Her eyes, the shape of her face, her lips,\nthey're almost the same.
Knowing that if I was to touch those lips I could\nfeel the same sensation as I felt before, I\ninstinctively get heated.
...But.
They resemble each other... She resembles her\nmore than anyone else in the world but she isn't\nAgeha.
Hotaru slowly opened her eyes.
Her gaze had such a deep light that can make\nanyone falter.
That obedient and quiet Hotaru was totally\ncontrolling the situation
'You... won't do it?'
Feeling as if I'm going to be pulled into her\neyes I remain silent.
'I guess if it's not Ageha it won't do?'
Hotaru asks without changing her expression.
'It's OK. You can do the same thing you did with\nAgeha.'
'Hey!'
'The same thing? Now wait...'
'What did you do with her?'
'You trying to trick me into talking?'
'You did something serious, right?'
'That's...'
'The other day Ageha... when it starting raining\nsuddenly. She came home all cheerful and bubbly.'
'She tried to act normal. In front of me and\nMom.'
'But, as if she didn't realize it herself, she\nwas all giggly and excited. Staring off into\nspace and smiling.'
'In the bathroom she muttered 'Aoi', Then hastily\nwashed her face.'
'Then at night she was rolling around on her\nbed.'

'I could hear her stirring and rolling. Then she
went quiet and I thought she'd fallen asleep. But
then she went to the bathroom and washed her
face.'
'The next morning she was taking shower longer\nthan usual, and she even washed her panties by\nhand and hanged them to dry in her room.'
'Hey!'
'A-chan is really bad at hiding things.\nEspecially when holding them in her hands.'
'And I think you're really something, spying on\nher like that.'
'I may look like Hotaru Himegi, but my real\nidentity is Hotaru Himegi.'
'That's the same thing!'
'Ageha thinks of nothing but you'
'When we're at home, whatever we talk about it's\nalways Aoi this, Aoi that. Aoi did this. If it\nwas Aoi... Hey did you know Aoi...'
'To be honest I've gotten a bit sick of it. It's\ntiresome. All that mushy, lovey dovey stuff kind\nof makes me sick.'
'So I thought that maybe if I was to get all\nintimate with you, maybe I could reduce the\nnausea I feel.'
Saying this Hotaru took my hand and pulled it to\nher wet swimsuit.
'Here, my breasts.'
Damp and a bit rough swimsuit's texture.
And a soft bulge beneath it...
All my senses concentrated into the hand, making\nmy blood so hot as if it was boiling.
You know, doing something like this... man's\ninstincts and physiology...
Hotaru is cute, really to my taste.
She's okay with it, and as a man... going against\nwoman's advances... no one is looking, and if\nwe'll keep it a secret...
...but.
My body is definitely hot, but another face\nfloatng in my mind became even more vivid.
And because of that I was able to take my\ninstincts under control.
'Sorry. I'll pass.'
I calmly removed my hand.
'Because mine are not as large as A-chan's?'
'This has nothing to do with it'
I slowly closed my eyes.
A face that resembles Hotaru's, but has a smile\nthat I love so much, surfaced in my mind.
'I won't betray the girl I love.'
When I said it, my body became hot for a\ndifferent reason.
'I like you. You're cute, mature, my heart is\nbeating really fast because of you.'
'But from long ago... the one I love is Ageha.'
'You guys don't seem to be getting along now.'
'Yeah she's driving me nuts.'
'It's just that thing that I don't know bothers\nme so much.'
'If it was someone I didn't care about it\nwouldn't be such a big deal.'
'So then... I won't do?'
'If I didn't know Ageha I would totally fall for\nyou, seriously.'
I pat her on the head.
'Hm... You like her that much?'
'Yeah. Sorry I do.'
'I see.'
Will she cry? Get angry?... I wonder.
She laughs.
'That's good.'
'It's good?'
'I like you Aoi... But I also like Ageha.'
'I like that you like Ageha.'
'I like seeing you two together.'
'If you started to dislike Ageha, I think I'd\nprobably start disliking you.'
'So I'm actually glad.'
'Really?... Seriously?'
'Yeah.'
'I haven't seen Ageha that happy for a long\ntime.'
'Until you came back, Even at home Ageha rarely\nsmiled.'
'She didn't?'
'Yeah. I mean she has a lot of friends, but they\nnever come over. She never went out with them\neither.'
Now that you mention it Ageha did say that... She\ndoesn't have anyone. Anyone she would call a\nclose friend...
'After the incident she didn't laugh for a long\ntime.'
'The incident...? The thing to do with the secret\nbase?'
'I'll tell you about it later.'
'Tell me now.'
'Nope. Heh heh. I'm going to play around with you\nand annoy you.'
'You shouldn't be so mean to people.'
'I'm at an age when I want to be a little bad.'
'You're still a little young for that, aren't\nyou?'
'Aoi you seem like my father.'
'I'm cool with that.'
'If you act like my father it'll make me want to\nrun away. I'm a demon girl you know?'
'Did you pick that up from your sister?'
'Sisters act alike. Hee hee.'
...At that moment.
Behind us a startling sound.
'Whaaaaa?!'
Ageha opens her eyes wide and lets out a loud\nscream.
Surprised by her reaction I also let out a sound\nof alarm.
In the next instant.
Before I turn around I see it reflected in\nHotaru's wide eyes.
From within the water it appears... a goblin!
'Who's a goblin?'
'Aaaaahh!'
It's the genuine article!
'Ageha?!...'
'Hoootaaaruuu!'
Splashing water high in the air, charging at us\nfrom in the water, the goblin, mean, Ageha...!
There's no mistake, it's Ageha, the girl of the\nhour!
'Why... are you... ?'
'I just had this bad feeling.'
I have no idea what that means.
'When I came home Hotaru wasn't around, then Mom\ntold me. She went rushing out in some kind of\nhaste.'
'Why come out of the water?...'
'If I came close you would have seen me, right?'
As she says this she lunges at Hotaru and picks\nher up.
'Aaaahhh!'
'Hey, hey...'
When I say this Ageha gives me a terrifying\nglance.
I start to sweat.
'You wait there!'
And while still holding up Hotaru, Ageha...
Like a gust of wind she disappears...
Having totally lost my wits I dry off, change,\npack up Hotaru's things and wait...
I didn't have to wait long.
'Heh, heh, heh, heh'
'Oh, hey... welcome back...'
'Aoi!'
She rushes at me without any explanation and\ncomes up super close.
Actually, we're basically nose to nose, the only\nthing I can see is Ageha's eyes.
'Err... what happened to Hotaru?'
'I tied her up and chucked her into my house!'
Tied her up in her bathing suit and abandoned\nher... That's some crazy roughhousing.
'My mom was home so there's no problem, right?'
Does she really think so?
'Anyways you didn't do anything, did you?'
'Nothing, nothing, nothing. I almost did but I\ncaught myself at the last moment.'
'I knew it!'
'I didn't do anything!'
'... And anyways, if I did or I didn't, it has\nnothing to do with you, right?'
'It has a lot to do with me!'
'How?'
'It's my sister!'
'Your sister?'
'My sister.'
'So you mean you're not concerned about me?'
'Um... well...'
Ageha firmly shuts her mouth.
And then she steadily turns red.
'What are we Ageha?'
'What?!'
'I've already said it! I can't have expressed my\nfeelings anymore clearly.'

'So, what about you? You still haven't properly
given me your answer. So we're strangers, right?
So whatever I do with Hotaru, you don't have the
right to complain.'
As Ageha falters it's my turn to come in close to\nher.
'Now is fine, let me hear your answer. I like\nyou, I want to go out with you. How about you?!'
'Um, um, um...'
Ageha's eyes dance back and forth as she twitches\nher cheeks and mouth.
Making various faces and puckering her lips...
Her face goes completely red and looks like it's\nabout to burst. It looks as if steam is about to\nburst from the top of her head.
'Waaaaahhh!'
Screaming, she flips her body over.
Splash!
She... jumps into the water...
'Hey!'
She's not wearing a bathing suit.
'Burble, burble, burble, Waaah, burble, burble.'
She makes loud noises as she tries to swim for\nthe sea... and sinks!
'Ah, ah, aaaah?!'
A shiver runs down my spine and I hurriedly rush\nafter her.
I rush in, dive and swim towards Ageha as fast as\npossible.
Whoaaaa!
Ah, my clothes! I'm still wearing them so they\ncling to my body!
'Uh, gurgle, gurgle.'
Now I've done it. Oh man I'm going to drown!
My feet find the bottom. I kick up and jump out.\nA gasp for air!
'...What are you doing?'
Directly next to me, Ageha is floating normally.
I guess if you're scantily clad swimming is no\nproblem.
...But.
'Cough, cough... Hey!'
'Ah, yeah... sorry'
'I almost drowned.'
'Yeah, sorry.'
'Huff, huff... Jeez... I'm soaked.'
'Sorry.'
Ageha's just as wet.
The sun is still high in the sky, if we lay out\nin the sun we'll dry relatively quickly. So we\ndecide to do that.

'Yeah...'
As if it her personality was cleaned by the lake\nAgeha is acting uncharacteristically docile.

'Of course I did.'

'If we hadn't known each other for so long I'd be\nreally angry right now. It's at the point where\nI'd say 'this girl's not worth it'.'

Looking like she thought of something\ninteresting, Ageha started to take off her\nclothes... wait, what?!
